title: Bicycle Theft Protection
terms_and_conditions: This bicycle insurance policy provides protection against theft, damage, and liability for bicycle owners. The policy covers theft of your bicycle with full replacement value up to $5,000. Coverage includes theft from your home, workplace, or while locked in public places. The policy covers damage to your bicycle from accidents, vandalism, and weather events with a deductible of $200. Liability coverage protects you if you cause injury or property damage while riding, with limits of $100,000 per incident. The policy includes coverage for bicycle accessories such as lights, locks, and baskets up to $500. Medical payments coverage of $2,500 is included for injuries sustained while riding your insured bicycle. The policy covers all bicycles owned by the policyholder, including electric bicycles. Coverage is valid worldwide, making it ideal for travelers. Exclusions include racing, commercial use, and damage from normal wear and tear. The policy requires proof of purchase and serial number registration. Coverage for bicycles over 5 years old is limited to actual cash value rather than replacement cost. The policy includes a 24-hour claims hotline and online claim filing. Bicycles must be properly secured with a lock when left unattended to maintain theft coverage. The policy offers discounts for storing bicycles in secure locations and for membership in bicycle advocacy organizations.
